channel.title: Error
channel.description: Ok my server has been running perfectly for a long time, but like suddenly this happened: Whenever I kill an npc, right as it is like dead on the ground but before the drop comes, my server just freezes. Here is a picture of the error: [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/15gukhd.jpg[/img] Someone help, please? Don't tell me what I did wrong, also tell me how to fix it. Thanks!

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @m3l33_demon m3l33 demon
item.description:
@m3l33_demon wrote:

It’s any npc that I kill, not just one…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: May 23, 2009, 11:06:29 am[/size][hr]Someone help please?

Read full topic

item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

Go into your NPCHandler class and search for the NPC ID that you were killing and post the code here.

Read full topic

Ok my server has been running perfectly for a long time, but like suddenly this happened:
Whenever I kill an npc, right as it is like dead on the ground but before the drop comes, my server just freezes. Here is a picture of the error:
